title: China Evergrande unit to make onshore bond coupon payments
dc:creator: Erica Ascher
description:
Reuters was ahead of the competition on Sept 22 with news that China Evergrande’s main unit Hengda Real Estate Group […]

The post China Evergrande unit to make onshore bond coupon payments appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters was ahead of the competition on Sept 22 with news that China Evergrande’s main unit Hengda Real Estate Group said it would make bond interest rate payments on Sept 23 after private negotiations with bondholders. 

The post China Evergrande unit to make onshore bond coupon payments appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
